rules_text:
Hexproof
When Cantrip Collector enters the battlefield, rediscover an instant card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's an instant card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I don't know why I can do this now or what I'll be able to do next. I wouldn't have it any other way.”[/i]
